segments.text: Okay I've got one for you, if you had too which one would you rather eat, a seeing eye dog or a talking gorilla?
segments.speaker: Phoebe

segments.text: I'd have to say...the talking gorilla, because at least I can explain to him that you're making me eat him.
segments.speaker: Cliff

segments.text: Somebody went to college. Wow.  What is it? I'm sorry.
segments.speaker: Phoebe
